data.comment: St. Truidense kick-off to get the first-half underway.
St. Truidense kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Liege are down to 10 men after Zinho Vanheusden has been shown a red card.
Liege kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Ibrahima Sory Sankhon for St. Truidense has been booked by Christof Dierick and receives a first yellow card.
Seung-Woo Lee (St. Truidense) gets a yellow card.
Obbi Oulare is replacing Duje Cop for Liege at Stade Maurice Dufrasne.
The away team have replaced Seung-Woo Lee with Duckens Nazon. This is the first substitution made today by Milos Kostic.
Milos Kostic (St. Truidense) is making a second substitution, with Samuel Asamoah replacing Steve De Ridder.
The home team replace Maxime Lestienne with Senna Miangue.
Liege make their third substitution with Selim Amallah replacing Mehdi Carcela-Gonz√°lez.
Jorge Teixeira is booked for the away team.
Rocky Bushiri (St. Truidense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Chris Durkin is on a sub for Alexandre De Bruyn for St. Truidense.
